summary: An email chain from September 5, 2019, forwarding a document titled 'EPSTEIN: HSI Capabilities' from an HSI Special Agent to an FBI agent. The email indicates interest in pursuing a potential same-sex marriage fraud scheme orchestrated by Jeffrey Epstein, based on a newspaper article.

persons.name: Buckley
persons.role: HSI/NY Special Agent, Document and Benefit Fraud Task Force
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email forwarding a document about Epstein and a potential marriage fraud scheme to an FBI agent.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the potential orchestrator of a same-sex marriage fraud scheme that HSI is interested in pursuing.

events.title: HSI forwards Epstein marriage fraud lead to FBI
events.description: An HSI Special Agent emails an FBI agent, forwarding a document and expressing interest in pursuing a potential same-sex marriage fraud scheme orchestrated by Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: HSI (Homeland Security Investigations) had information about a potential same-sex marriage fraud scheme orchestrated by Jeffrey Epstein.
The information was based on a newspaper article read by an HSI agent's partner.
HSI Special Agent Buckley forwarded a document titled 'EPSTEIN: HSI Capabilities' to an FBI agent on September 5, 2019, seeking collaboration.
The email indicates an active investigative interest in Epstein beyond the primary sex trafficking charges, focusing on document and benefit fraud.
